name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Covers core data structure topics with practical problems and C++ examples.

name: Operating System Concepts
description: Standard OS textbook covering process, memory, file systems and Linux.

name: Computer Networks
description: Detailed guide on networking protocols, topologies, and communication models.

name: Database System Concepts
description: Database architecture, design, SQL, and transaction management.

name: Java: The Complete Reference
description: Comprehensive coverage of Java programming language with examples.

name: Introduction to the Theory of Computation
description: Explains automata theory, formal languages, and Turing machines.

name: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach
description: Classic book on AI techniques, planning, robotics, and natural language.

name: Clean Code
description: Best practices for writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code.

name: Python Crash Course
description: A hands-on introduction to Python programming for beginners.

name: You Don’t Know JS
description: Deep dive into JavaScript core concepts, closures, scope and more.

name: The Pragmatic Programmer
description: Tips and techniques for professional software developers.

name: C Programming Language
description: Classic reference by Kernighan & Ritchie for learning C.

name: Introduction to Algorithms (CLRS)
description: Extensive algorithm guide covering complexity and data structures.

name: Cracking the Coding Interview
description: Tech interview preparation with 189 programming questions.

name: Machine Learning with Python
description: Hands-on ML projects and libraries using Python.

description: Develop dApps using Ethereum, Solidity, and Web3.js.

name: Computer Organization and Design
description: Microprocessors, memory hierarchy, and assembly programming.

name: The Art of Computer Programming
description: Comprehensive work by Donald Knuth on algorithms and logic.

name: Deep Learning with Python
description: Build deep learning models with Keras and TensorFlow.
